title: Fire Extinguisher Use and Location Review
notes: Reviewed all fire extinguisher locations and proper PASS technique with building staff

title: Slip Trip and Fall Prevention
notes: Focused on wet floor procedures and proper signage placement in lobbies and pool areas

title: Pool Chemical Handling Safety
notes: Covered chlorine and acid handling procedures for pool maintenance staff

title: Electrical Safety and Lockout Tagout
notes: Reviewed LOTO procedures for electrical panel work and equipment maintenance

title: Heat Illness Prevention
notes: Summer heat safety protocols - hydration and work-rest cycles for outdoor crews

title: Hurricane Preparedness Procedures
notes: Full hurricane plan review - evacuation routes and equipment securing procedures

title: Ladder Safety and Fall Protection
notes: Proper ladder setup and use of harnesses for maintenance work above 6 feet

title: Confined Space Entry - Mechanical Rooms
notes: Reviewed permit requirements and atmospheric testing for boiler and pump rooms

title: Personal Protective Equipment Review
notes: Annual PPE inspection and replacement - gloves goggles and respirators

title: Elevator Emergency Procedures
notes: Procedures for elevator entrapment rescue and communication with trapped occupants

title: Hazard Communication and SDS Review
notes: GHS label reading and SDS location review for all chemicals stored on-site

title: Year-End Safety Review and 2026 Goals
notes: Annual safety performance review and setting goals for next year
